### Who had the most lines in the series?

Let's see which characters had the most lines of dialogue. We'll use a filter to only show characters that had 1,000 or more lines in the series.
source.6ec1f8c6: Michael had by far the most lines of dialogue in the series, with over 11,000, followed by Dwight, Jim, Pam, and Andy. Many of the "background" Office workers (including many of the writers on the show) each had over 1,000 lines of dialogue.
